conversations.content: Search for TODO comments in the codebase

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732102000000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732102000000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Finding TODOs", "sessionMemory": "Reviewing pending tasks", "toolContext": "Searching for task markers", "primaryGoal": "Task tracking", "subgoal": "Find all TODO comments"}, "query": "TODO", "limit": 50}
